ok this took me 5 fucking tries but got it... 1st I'm using an EnGB version (the collectors ED)
install it, then it updates auto. It needs to update again as well, if it doesn't do this... close the launcher and relaunch from the desktop shortcut (only use this to launch the game) if it still doesn't update, restart your pc and relaunch again. Once it's updated RUN THE GAME 1st WITH NO CRACKS APPLIED... then close it, apply the cracks and start from "Start Campaign" also the tutorials work... any other combination and this will fuck-up. Trust me I have been going at it for hours. BTW I have launched and relaunched the game and played briefly 4 times to verify

Sorry for a dumb question, but how do I shut down the game? (other than ctrl+alt+del thing)
Why would you ever want to stop playing sc2? :D i havent actually found a way other then to minimize and right click sc2 and "close program" or going all task manager on it

thank you very much for this it worked for me i downloaded the game from blizzard and used this crack..also i read in gameinformer that this game burns your video card or something not really sure what they meant but its just a heads up to all of you,  here is what they wrote..."the game's menu screens aren't framerate-limited. This means that when there's nothing else going on, your graphics hardware renders the bejeezus out of those screens, causing nasty overheating problems. The fix is easy, requiring players to add the following lines to your "Documents\StarCraft II\variables.txt" file 

frameratecapglue=30
frameratecap=60
